paper_abstract: This paper addresses issues of stability analysis and H-infinity control for a class of fuzzy time-delay descriptor systems described by an extended Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) fuzzy model. A delay-dependent stability criterion is first presented, and a H-infinity control synthesis approach is then developed. Both the stability criterion and the H-infinity controller synthesis are based on the solutions of linear matrix inequalities (LMIs). Finally, two examples are given to illustrate the effectiveness of the approaches proposed in this paper. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All tights reserved.
paper_title: Delay-dependent stability and H-infinity control for a class of fuzzy descriptor systems with time-delay
